autofix.replacementText: @Layoutable

result.rule: Custom components with custom layout capability need to add the "@Layoutable" decorator (arkui-custom-layout-need-add-decorator)

autofix.replacementText: startPos: number = 300

result.rule: Numeric semantics is different for integer values (arkts-numeric-semantic)

autofix.replacementText: pos: number = startPos - child.measureResult.height

result.rule: Numeric semantics is different for integer values (arkts-numeric-semantic)

autofix.replacementText: @Layoutable

result.rule: Custom components with custom layout capability need to add the "@Layoutable" decorator (arkui-custom-layout-need-add-decorator)

autofix.replacementText: size: number = 100

result.rule: Numeric semantics is different for integer values (arkts-numeric-semantic)
Use explicit types instead of "any", "unknown" (arkts-no-any-unknown)
